verses.plain: In thee, O LORD, do I put my trust: let me never be put to confusion.

tokens.t: In thee, O
, do I put my trust: let me never be put to confusion.

verses.plain: Deliver me in thy righteousness, and cause me to escape: incline thine ear unto me, and save me.

tokens.t: Deliver me in thy righteousness, and cause me to escape: incline thine ear unto me, and save me.

verses.plain: Be thou my strong habitation, whereunto I may continually resort: thou hast given commandment to save me; for thou art my rock and my fortress.

tokens.t: Be thou my strong habitation, whereunto I may continually resort: thou hast given commandment to save me; for thou
my rock and my fortress.

verses.plain: Deliver me, O my God, out of the hand of the wicked, out of the hand of the unrighteous and cruel man.

tokens.t: Deliver me, O my God, out of the hand of the wicked, out of the hand of the unrighteous and cruel man.

verses.plain: For thou art my hope, O Lord GOD: thou art my trust from my youth.

tokens.t: For thou
my hope, O Lord
my trust from my youth.

verses.plain: By thee have I been holden up from the womb: thou art he that took me out of my mother’s bowels: my praise shall be continually of thee.

tokens.t: By thee have I been holden up from the womb: thou art he that took me out of my mother’s bowels: my praise
continually of thee.

verses.plain: I am as a wonder unto many; but thou art my strong refuge.

tokens.t: I am as a wonder unto many; but thou
my strong refuge.

verses.plain: Let my mouth be filled with thy praise and with thy honour all the day.

tokens.t: Let my mouth be filled
thy praise
thy honour all the day.

verses.plain: Cast me not off in the time of old age; forsake me not when my strength faileth.

tokens.t: Cast me not off in the time of old age; forsake me not when my strength faileth.

verses.plain: For mine enemies speak against me; and they that lay wait for my soul take counsel together,

tokens.t: For mine enemies speak against me; and they that lay wait for my soul take counsel together,

verses.plain: Saying, God hath forsaken him: persecute and take him; for there is none to deliver him.

tokens.t: Saying, God hath forsaken him: persecute and take him; for
none to deliver

verses.plain: O God, be not far from me: O my God, make haste for my help.

tokens.t: O God, be not far from me: O my God, make haste for my help.

verses.plain: Let them be confounded and consumed that are adversaries to my soul; let them be covered with reproach and dishonour that seek my hurt.

tokens.t: Let them be confounded
consumed that are adversaries to my soul; let them be covered
reproach and dishonour that seek my hurt.

verses.plain: But I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more.

tokens.t: But I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more.

verses.plain: My mouth shall shew forth thy righteousness and thy salvation all the day; for I know not the numbers thereof.

tokens.t: My mouth shall shew forth thy righteousness
thy salvation all the day; for I know not the numbers

verses.plain: I will go in the strength of the Lord GOD: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.

tokens.t: I will go in the strength of the Lord
: I will make mention of thy righteousness,
of thine only.

verses.plain: O God, thou hast taught me from my youth: and hitherto have I declared thy wondrous works.

tokens.t: O God, thou hast taught me from my youth: and hitherto have I declared thy wondrous works.

verses.plain: Now also when I am old and grayheaded, O God, forsake me not; until I have shewed thy strength unto this generation, and thy power to every one that is to come.

tokens.t: Now also when I am old and grayheaded, O God, forsake me not; until I have shewed thy strength unto
generation,
thy power to every one
is to come.

verses.plain: Thy righteousness also, O God, is very high, who hast done great things: O God, who is like unto thee!

tokens.t: Thy righteousness also, O God,
very high, who hast done great things: O God, who
like unto thee!

verses.plain: Thou, which hast shewed me great and sore troubles, shalt quicken me again, and shalt bring me up again from the depths of the earth.

tokens.t: , which hast shewed me great and sore troubles, shalt quicken me again, and shalt bring me up again from the depths of the earth.

verses.plain: Thou shalt increase my greatness, and comfort me on every side.

tokens.t: Thou shalt increase my greatness, and comfort me on every side.

verses.plain: I will also praise thee with the psaltery, even thy truth, O my God: unto thee will I sing with the harp, O thou Holy One of Israel.

tokens.t: I will also praise thee with the psaltery,
thy truth, O my God: unto thee will I sing with the harp, O thou Holy One of Israel.

verses.plain: My lips shall greatly rejoice when I sing unto thee; and my soul, which thou hast redeemed.

tokens.t: My lips shall greatly rejoice when I sing unto thee; and my soul, which thou hast redeemed.

verses.plain: My tongue also shall talk of thy righteousness all the day long: for they are confounded, for they are brought unto shame, that seek my hurt.

tokens.t: My tongue also shall talk of thy righteousness all the day long: for they are confounded, for they are brought unto shame, that seek my hurt.

footnotes.text: Be…: Heb. Be thou to me for a rock of habitation
when…: Heb. unto old age and gray hairs
the psaltery: Heb. the instrument of psaltery
